Name: Avalon Hussars
Details: The Avalon Hussars are the descendants of the Terran Alliance Marines that served on the world of New Avalon in the early age of human extraterrestrial colonization. The Avalon Hussars are the oldest fighting force in the Federated Suns, having formed in 2317 from a Terran armor regiment. Since the Hussars are a large force and usually loyal to House Davion and the Federated Suns, they are well equipped.
